documentType: aircraft purchase agreement and related closing documents
summary: This document set contains the purchase agreement, amendments, bills of sale, title search reports, and correspondence related to the sale of a 2008 Sikorsky S-76C++ helicopter (N722JE) from Hyperion Air, LLC (seller) to Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC (purchaser) in April-May 2021. The seller is linked to the Estate of Jeffrey Epstein, and the transaction involves escrow management and title verification.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Signs documents as the authorized representative for Hyperion Air, LLC (seller) and provides wire transfer instructions for the Estate of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Rich Munkvold
persons.context: Signs documents as the CFO for Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC (purchaser) and is the point of contact for title search reports.

persons.name: Larry Visoski
persons.context: Digitally signs bills of sale and other documents as the Manager of Hyperion Air, LLC, and provides personal wire instructions for Flying V Aviation, LLC.

persons.name: Melissa Koboldt
persons.context: Escrow agent at AIC Title Service, LLC managing the closing process, coordinating document execution, and facilitating fund disbursements.

persons.name: Bryan Vaughan
persons.context: Certified the FAA and International Registry title search reports for the aircraft and engines on April 21, 2021.

persons.name: Jonathan Williams
persons.context: Copied on correspondence to assist with closing in Melissa Koboldt's absence.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Copied on email correspondence regarding the escrow and closing process.

persons.name: Gary Anzalone
persons.context: Copied on email correspondence regarding the escrow and closing process.

persons.name: Eric Roth
persons.context: Named as the proprietor of International Jet Interiors, which performed a custom refurbishment on the helicopter in 2019.

persons.name: Tia Goodman
persons.context: Copied on an email from Larry Visoski regarding the delivery receipt.

connections.description: Darren Indyke acts as the authorized representative and signatory for Hyperion Air, LLC, the seller of the helicopter.
Darren Indyke provides wire transfer instructions to the Estate of Jeffrey Epstein, identified as the sole member of seller Hyperion Air, LLC.
Rich Munkvold acts as the Chief Financial Officer and signatory for Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC, the purchaser of the helicopter.
Larry Visoski is the Manager of Hyperion Air, LLC, as indicated on signed documents and correspondence.
Melissa Koboldt is the escrow agent acting on behalf of AIC Title Service, LLC, managing the transaction escrow.
They communicate extensively via email to coordinate the closing, document execution, and fund disbursement for the helicopter sale.
The two entities are parties to an Aircraft Purchase Agreement for the sale of helicopter N722JE.

events.title: Original Aircraft Purchase Agreement Executed
events.description: Hyperion Air, LLC and Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC enter into an agreement for the sale of helicopter N722JE for $1,800,000.

events.title: First Amendment to Purchase Agreement
events.description: The parties amend the agreement to extend the closing deadline from April 20, 2021, to May 7, 2021.

events.title: Title and Lien Searches Conducted
events.description: AIC Title Service conducts FAA and International Registry lien searches on the airframe and engines, finding no liens.

events.title: Second Amendment to Purchase Agreement
events.description: The parties amend the agreement again to extend the closing deadline to May 13, 2021, with an increased non-refundable deposit of $200,000.

events.title: Scheduled Closing Date
events.description: The final closing date for the transaction, where title and possession of the helicopter are to be transferred at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport, Florida.

events.title: FAA Certificate of Aircraft Registration Issued
events.description: The FAA issues a Certificate of Aircraft Registration for N722JE to the purchaser, Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC, valid until July 31, 2024.

locations: 9053 Estate Thomas, Suite 101, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands (Hyperion Air address)
2151 E. Convention Center Way, Ste. 222, Ontario, CA 91764-5496 (Purchaser address)
6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802 (Hyperion Air registration address)
Oklahoma City, Oklahoma (AIC Title Service/FAA Registry)
keyFacts: The seller, Hyperion Air, LLC, is identified as being owned by the Estate of Jeffrey Epstein, as per wire instructions provided by Darren Indyke.
The helicopter (N722JE) was previously owned by Aetna Insurance, as noted in the inspection exhibit regarding passenger headset wiring.
The purchase price was $1,800,000, with a deposit that became a non-refundable $200,000 after the second amendment.
Title searches confirmed the aircraft had no liens and a chain of ownership from Freedom Air International, Inc. to ASI Wings, LLC to Hyperion Air, LLC.
The closing was delayed multiple times, requiring two amendments to extend the deadline from April 20 to May 13, 2021.
